text.name: info5
text.text: Graphics: 60 Hz NTSC, 50 Hz PAL, 71.2 Hz monochrome

text.name: info9
text.text: The Atari ST is a line of home computers from Atari Corporation

text.name: info10
text.text: It is the first personal computer to come with a bitmapped color GUI,

text.name: info11
text.text: using a version of Digital Research's GEM released in February 1985.
